name: 4 The Cheese
description:
Who cut the cheese? We did. Can you squeak by enemies on your way to claim cheddar? Explore a totally ratical dungeon filled with ferocious felines. Avoid their sight and make it to the exit before time to live to tell the tail.

Beware though! The taste of cheese is so divine that it will scramble up your senses and make your movements confused! Focus to the bottom right to reorientate yourself!  

Objective: Find the cheeze and get to the exit.

Controls: WASD or Arrow Keys

Credits: All assets are made by our team.
